title: Welcome to GlobalSpeak
description: Switch languages to view this page in your preferred language.
about_text: GlobalSpeak is a lightweight translation layer for modern web apps, powered by AI.
how_it_works_text: We extract your UI strings, translate them using AI, and flag cultural issues for review.
testimonials: “GlobalSpeak saved us weeks of manual translation work.”
“The cultural review feature is a game-changer!”

faq.a: Yes, the core features are free to use.

faq.q: Can I add my own translations?
faq.a: Absolutely! You can override or edit any string manually.
